section.title: archiva-webdav Codebase Intellectual Property (IP) Clearance Status
Description
section.p: This is code from the plexus-webdav component at Codehaus which is used within Archiva that will now be maintained (and restructured) within the project specific to its own purposes.

The library includes a fork of the it.could webdav library (http://could.it/main/a-simple-approach-to-webdav.html). The code is licensed under the Apache License 2.0. It is also written by an Apache CLA holder, Pier Fumagalli, however he is not involved in this fork.

ul.li: Which PMC will be responsible for the code: Apache Maven
Officer or member managing donation: Brett Porter
